title: Join The Alliance
cleaned_text:
What is the FLCCC Alliance?

 The Alliance is a free, members-only community that brings together like-minded individuals interested in medical freedom, repurposed medicine, alternative therapies, and the latest science and research on COVID and other emerging issues. Currently over 2,000 healthcare professionals from around the world are part of the Alliance.

Who is it for?

 Physicians, nurses, other healthcare professionals, scientists, researchers, data specialists, etc.

What are the benefits?

 By joining the Alliance, you will gain access to exclusive content crafted for professionals like yourself. Alliance members will receive news updates, alerts on emerging issues, research papers, and invitation-only access to online and offline events featuring the doctors of the FLCCC.

NOTE: If you are looking to be listed on the FLCCC’s directories, please go to our Provider Directory or Pharmacy Directory listing request page.
